name: Panacea (undeadknight11)
description:
DOWNLOAD TO PLAY THE GAME

A turn-based RPG following three professionals as they traverse the virus-ridden island in search of the source of malice.

How to Play (Overworld):

Use WASD to move and mouse button to progress dialog.

How to Play (Battle):

Send an enemy home by either reducing their HP to 0 or maxing out their CLEAN meter. Use the mouse.

Careful! If an enemy reaches 0 clean they gain the coronavirus, and coming into contact with you will end the battle!

Takes roughly around 15-20 minutes to complete!

All assets (besides the ones credited below) were made in a two-week period for the TAMU LIVE Lab Covid Jam.  

Made with a team of three people.

Credits:

Programming (Combat Game-play) / Combat Designer: Itch.io

Programming ("Overworld" mechanics) / Pixel Art + Animation:  Instagram

Character Art/Character Design/Pixel Art: Instagram

Unoriginal Assets:

freesound:  https://freesound.org/s/204717/ https://freesound.org/people/JayHu/sounds/506103/

Music: https://soundcloud.com/acclion

Programs Used:

Adobe Animate - Battle Transition Animation

Unity - Game Engine

Visual Studio - Code

Procreate - Character Art / Title Splash

Aseprite/Pixaki - Pixel Art

Audacity - Character voices

Discord - Communication
